attributes.action: Condemn Mr Graham Stringer MP's comments regarding dyslexia, and affirm the importance of specialist assessment and teaching of dyslexia in school children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition seeks not to make any party political point, but to condemn to the words of Graham Stringer MP, who stated that dyslexia was  "cruel fiction" that should be consigned to the "dustbin of history" and expressed a view that money should not be spent on specialist dyslexia education.
